original_text: Do not be like that person. You think that you are better than your friend. But you are not. First, you must take the big piece of wood out of your own eye. After that, your eyes will see clearly. Then you can take the small piece of dirt out of your friend's eye.
korean_text: 외식하는 자여 먼저 네 눈 속에서 들보를 빼어라 그 후에야 밝히 보고 형제의 눈 속에서 티를 빼리라

sentences.original_text: Do not be like that person
You think that you are better than your friend
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 친구보다 자신이 더 낫다고 생각한다

sentences.original_text: First, you must take the big piece of wood out of your own eye
sentences.korean_translation: 먼저, 당신은 자신의 눈에서 큰 나무 조각을 꺼내야 한다

sentences.original_text: After that, your eyes will see clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 당신의 눈은 분명하게 볼 수 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then you can take the small piece of dirt out of your friend's eye
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 당신은 친구의 눈에서 작은 먼지 조각을 꺼낼 수 있다
